column5: I am going into Beaverhouse Lake (Quetico) in June. Is there actually a Flanders, Ontario? Anybody know anything about the road from my mythical Flanders to the landing? Thanks a bunch.
Flanders is just up the road on HWY 11 from Atikokan. About 15km.
Frank, Thanks for the directions. Appreciate it.

The Flanders road is 27 miles west of Atikokan. There are a number of resorts in the area. Type in Flanders in your search engine (Google)and you will get some hits.I have fished the area about 15 years ago. Age has a way of making things seem closer. Have a good trip............Frank
